com.mygdx.game

Class DoorBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.DoorBody

  • public class DoorBody
extends java.lang.Object
    A class derived from BoxBody that represents the closed door bodies on the world

        Parameters:
        world - the box2d world.
        object - the object from the tiled map that defines the box2d body
